traits.description: One-time protection against the forge. This card will not get destroyed when used in the forge.

traits.name: Gravity
traits.description: a card with gravity trait will attract cards sacrificed by the forge, and perhaps some additional perks. The goal could be to evolve your gravity to be a supermassive black hole that sucks up all kinds of awesome stuff.

traits.name: New Commons
traits.description: Rerolls only common layers, maybe allowing you to choose of one of two choices for each.

traits.name: 1 UP
traits.description: once you burn this trait you get an extra Life to use in Royal or Punks battle
